title: N162 Mike King Kelly PSA 1 and N172 Billy Hamilton SGC 10
author: TheKid41

posts.post_title: N162 Mike King Kelly PSA 1 and N172 Billy Hamilton SGC 10
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone,

N162 Goodwin Champions King Kelly Has been SOLD.

N172 Old Judge "Sliding" Billy Hamilton has been SOLD.

Kelly has paper loss and Billy has a mark/scratch on the bottom front. Both still present very well with distinct colors and great contrast. Very nice low grade options for both of these HOFers.

Feel free to email me at [url]mikewolf.nyc@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks!
Mike
